if (s.wins >= 1) achs.push({ name: 'First Blood', desc: 'Win your first game', icon: '🩸', unlocked: true })
if (s.wins >= 10) achs.push({ name: 'Serial Winner', desc: 'Win 10 games', icon: '🏆', unlocked: true })
if (s.wins >= 100) achs.push({ name: 'Tic-Tac-Legend', desc: 'Win 100 games', icon: '👑', unlocked: true })
if (s.bestStreak >= 3) achs.push({ name: 'Hot Streak', desc: '3 wins in a row', icon: '🔥', unlocked: true })
if (s.bestStreak >= 5) achs.push({ name: 'Unstoppable', desc: '5 wins in a row', icon: '💪', unlocked: true })
if (s.draws >= 5) achs.push({ name: 'Diplomat', desc: 'Draw 5 games', icon: '🕊️', unlocked: true })
if (s.losses >= 10) achs.push({ name: 'Persistent', desc: 'Lose 10 times but keep going', icon: '🐢', unlocked: true })
if (s.gamesPlayed >= 50) achs.push({ name: 'Dedicated', desc: 'Play 50 games', icon: '⭐', unlocked: true })
if (s.wins < 1) achs.push({ name: 'First Blood', desc: 'Win your first game', icon: '🔒', unlocked: false })
if (s.wins < 10) achs.push({ name: 'Serial Winner', desc: 'Win 10 games', icon: '🔒', unlocked: false })
if (s.wins < 100) achs.push({ name: 'Tic-Tac-Legend', desc: 'Win 100 games', icon: '🔒', unlocked: false })
if (s.bestStreak < 10) achs.push({ name: 'Godlike', desc: '10 wins in a row', icon: '🔒', unlocked: false })

🤔 Why Does This Exist?
Because someone asked for an ""over-engineered"" tic-tac-toe game, and we took that personally.
What started as a simple 3x3 grid became a full-fledged enterprise application with more features
✨ Features That Nobody Asked For:
• ✅ Imaginary background music with 5 genre options
• ✅ Power-ups that barely do anything useful
• ✅ 6 difficulty levels that are essentially identical
• ✅ A Settings page with premium features that don't exist
🏗️ Technology Stack:
• • AI opponent (just Math.random with extra steps)
📜 Legal Disclaimer:
No actual music is included in this application. All sound effects are text-based representations.
The ""AI"" is not sentient (we think). Premium features are satirical. Any resemblance to
actual enterprise software is purely intentional and meant for comedic effect.
📊 Unnecessary Statistics:
""We could have just used pen and paper, but where's the fun in that?""
